titles.title: National Flood Insurance Program Automatic Extension Act of 2025
National Flood Insurance Program Automatic Extension Act of 2025
A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to provide for the automatic contingent extension of the National Flood Insurance Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
